```css
// Property: clearButtonMode
// Description: Determines when the clear button is displayed.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.TextField
'.clear-button-mode-always': { clearButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ALWAYS }
'.clear-button-mode-never': { clearButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_NEVER }
'.clear-button-mode-onblur': { clearButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONBLUR }
'.clear-button-mode-onfocus': { clearButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONFOCUS }
```
